txt1: The App Calculate Projection Mapping and Led Panel pixels.
how_to_txt: Choose what you want to calculate
how_to_led_panel_txt1: The App starts with 1 preset to demonstrate;
how_to_led_panel_txt2: You can create a new preset clicking on + button;
how_to_led_panel_txt3: You can copy a preset clicking on copy button (two squares);
how_to_led_panel_txt4: You can delete a preset clicking on delete button (trash);
how_to_led_panel_txt6: You can share the Result clicking on share button (in the end of Form);
how_to_led_panel_txt5: To Calculate you need to input the following variables:
consumption_by_m2_or_q: Consumption in Watts from m¬≤ or Quantity (Selectin it by the CheckBoxes)

how_to_projector_txt3: You can copy a preset clicking on copy button (two squares);
how_to_projector_txt4: You can delete a preset clicking on delete button (trash);
how_to_projector_txt6: You can share the Result clicking on share button (in the end of Form);
how_to_projector_txt5: To Calculate you need to input the following variables:
